participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Introverted and sensitive, often anxious in social situations.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, enjoys staying active and trying new fitness routines.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me.

content.text: i don't know why this is happening is this my connection
